    • pathToJsonObject

      static org.json.simple.JSONObject pathToJsonObject(String jsonPath, Class<?> cls) throws JsonBadParsingException
      This static method returns the JSONObject from a json file, it uses the "board" attribute.
      Parameters:
      jsonPath - path to the json file
      Returns:
      JSONObject with the content
      Throws:
      JsonBadParsingException
